sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { playlistCoverURL } from './DisplayPlaylists' import "./styles/PlaylistSummary.css" import spotifyIcon from "../Spotify_Primary_Logo_RGB_White.png" export default function PlaylistSummary(props) { const playlist = props.playlist const topArtists = props.topArtists const topAlbums = props.topAlbums const topGenres = props.topGenres const averagePopularity = props.averagePopularity const noData = props.noData return (
{playlist.name}
{playlist.owner.display_name}
Tracks: {playlist.tracks.total} Artists: {topArtists.length} Followers: {playlist.followers.total} {noData ? <> Top Artist: N/A Top Album: N/A Top Genre: N/A Popularity Score: N/A : <> Top Artist: {topArtists[0][0]} Top Album: {topAlbums[0][0]} Top Genre: {topGenres[0][0]} Popularity Score: {averagePopularity} }
) }
